autobiography.body:
Artist / Co-Founder of EMPIRE CAPITAL MUSIC / Founder of EAST COAST RECORDS 
El Patron is founder of the ground-breaking for the Bulgarian rap scene gangsta-rap group E.C.C.C. 
(EAST COAST CASH CREW) and established his own record label named EAST COAST RECORDS 
Later on the group drops one of its original members which had been replaced by bringing in 
new member for E.C.C.C. and creating a youngsters version of the group called Y.C.C.C. ( YOUNG CHAMPIONS CASH CREW ) .
A series of unfortunate events involving couple of the members of the crews made El Patron to take a radical decision
by dropping all of his artist from his record company.
El PATRON and EXC already established a long-term relationship based on their collaborations on a long list of super successful projects.
In 2018 they became the co-founders of  EMPIRE CAPITAL MUSIC .
